pageContext.title: Gauntlet Crisis
pageContext.description: Some situations are grueling and exhausting, wearing down your reserves faster than you can recover. Sooner or later, something has to give. When you encounter such a crisis, decide what it would take to survive it, such as escaping an enemy or saving a friend.

front.name: Gauntlet Crisis
front.desc: Some situations are grueling and exhausting, wearing down your reserves faster than you can recover. Sooner or later, something has to give. When you encounter such a crisis, decide what it would take to survive it, such as escaping an enemy or saving a friend.
prompts: A furious and violent vehicle chase
Survival in a hostile and dangerous environment
An extended and grueling magical ritual
front.rule: Define the scope of the crisis, and flip this card

back.name: Gauntlet Crisis
back.desc: You may not flip a card in front of you to generate a hit more than once. You may flip group cards (e.g. Plot cards) or draw/pick a new card (e.g. Condition card, Random oracle card).
back.rule: Flip this card when the crisis is past
